Title: Healthcare Sample App for the healthcare industry
Description: This application demonstrates some common Docusign API workflows including Docusign eSignature and real-time status.
FeaturesList:
• Remote signing
  • Templates
  • IDV (recipient authentication)
  • SMS delivery
  • Data entry tabs
  • Anchor positioning
  • Focused view
  • Signer attachment tabs
AboutDocuSign:
